decorator.label: CFEclipse CFC Decorator
decorator.description: Shows distinct icon for CFC files

action.label: Add folding markers
action.tooltip: Add folding markers and collapse the selected text

action.label: Clear folding markers.
action.tooltip: Clear folding markers from the selected text

action.label: Collapse the selected text.
action.tooltip: Collapse any folding markers in and around the selected text

action.label: Expand the selected text.
action.tooltip: Expand any folding markers in and around the selected text

action.label: Expand matching
action.tooltip: Expand any folding markers of a particular type

action.label: Collapse matching
action.tooltip: Collapse any folding markers of a particular type

action.label: Expand/collapse the selected text
action.tooltip: Expand or collapse any folding markers in and around the selected text

action.label: Locate in File Explorer View
action.tooltip: Locate file in File Explorer View

command.name: Insert Auto Comment
command.description: Insert a comment based on section.

command.name: Get Help
command.description: Goes to http://www.cfdocs.org to get the tag or function reference

command.name: Open scribble pad
command.description: Opens up the scribble pad file.

command.name: Toggle selection
command.description: Toggle the collapse/expand state of the selected text

wizard.name: CFML Page
wizard.description: Create a new blank CFML file

wizard.name: File From Template
wizard.description: Create a new file from a template snip
